titleStmt.title: By the Kyng and the Quene where as Henry Dudly, Christofer Aston the elder, Chrystofer Aston the yonger, Frauncys Horsey ... forgetting theyr dueties to almyghty God, their allegyaunce to the kinges & quenes maiesties ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1553-1558 : Mary I)
Mary I, Queen of England, 1516-1558.

publicationStmt.publisher: In ædibus Iohannis Cawodi typographi Regiæ Maiestatis,

notesStmt.note: Other title information from first six lines of text.
"Geuen at oure maner of Grenewych the fyrst daye of Apryll."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
